21027.description: Port for discovery broadcasts. You may need to open (protocol: udp) on your firewall.
21027.label: Discovery port [e.g. 21027]

22000.description: Port for incoming data. You may need to open (protocol: tcp) on your firewall.
22000.label: Listening port [e.g. 22000]

/config/Sync.description: Synced data. After installing, additional Shares can be added.
/config/Sync.label: Data Storage [e.g. syncthing-data]

PUID.description: Enter a valid UID to run Syncthing with. It must have full permissions to all Shares mapped in the previous step.
PUID.label: UID

PGID.description: Enter a valid GID to use along with the same UID. It(or the above UID) must have full permissions to all Shares mapped in the previous step.
PGID.label: GID

Syncthing.description:
Open Source continuous file synchronization; private, secure and easy to use.

Note: this container uses the `net=host` option to enable local IP addresses to be discovered as well.

Based on a custom OCI image, available for amd64 and arm64 architecture.
